title: Warhammer 40,000: Grimdark Camouflage Pack
description: Coat your fleet in Grimdark camouflages representing different factions of the Warhammer 40,000 universe: Chaos’ Primordial Annihilator, the Orks’ “The Red Threat,” the Imperial Navy’s Protector of the Faith, and the Black Templars’ “The Eternal Crusader.” Each camouflage has a unique visual style, as well as economic and combat bonuses.
longDescription:
# This package includes:

- 10x Primordial Annihilator expendable camouflages
- 10x “The Red Threat” expendable camouflages
- 10x “The Eternal Crusader” expendable camouflages
- 10x Protector of the Faith expendable camouflages

# When equipped, Primordial Annihilator camouflages provide the following bonuses:

- +100% XP per battle
- +100% Commander XP per battle
- –3% to your ship's detectability range by sea
- +4% to the maximum dispersion of shells fired by the enemy at your ship

# When equipped, “The Red Threat” camouflages provide the following bonuses:

- +100% XP per battle
- +100% Commander XP per battle
- –3% to your ship's detectability range by sea
- +4% to the maximum dispersion of shells fired by the enemy at your ship

# When equipped, “The Eternal Crusader” camouflages provide the following bonuses:

+100% XP per battle
+100% Commander XP per battle
–3% to your ship's detectability range by sea
+4% to the maximum dispersion of shells fired by the enemy at your ship

 # When equipped, “Protector of the Faith” camouflages provide the following bonuses:

+100% XP per battle
+100% Commander XP per battle
–3% to your ship's detectability range by sea
+4% to the maximum dispersion of shells fired by the enemy at your ship

This time-limited exclusive DLC is only available between June 1–7, 2022, and it can only be used with World of Warships game accounts created through Epic Games Store.
